CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_OPTIONS_UPD_SP" ( P_OPTION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_OPTION_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_OPTION_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_IS_SYSTEM IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_DATA_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, P_API_ENABLED IN NUMBER, P_MULTI IN NUMBER, P_LAST_UPDATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1
) IS V_COUNT NUMBER; V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT NVL (MAX (ID), -9) INTO V_ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = P_OPTION_CODE; IF (V_ID != -9) THEN UPDATE CMN_OPTIONS SET IS_SYSTEM = P_IS_SYSTEM, IS_ACTIVE = P_IS_ACTIVE, LAST_UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY = P_LAST_UPDATED_BY, API_ENABLED = P_API_ENABLED, MULTI_VALUED = P_MULTI, DATA_TYPE = P_DATA_TYPE WHERE ID = V_ID; /* Find out if this lookup type was already translated */ SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT (NAME || DESCRIPTION)) INTO V_COUNT FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_OPTIONS' AND PK_ID = V_ID; IF (V_COUNT <= 1)/* Not translated yet */ THEN CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_UPD_SP ( 'CMN_OPTIONS', V_ID, P_OPTION_NAME, P_OPTION_DESCRIPTION, P_LAST_UPDATED_BY ); END IF; END IF; END;
